marketplaces.repo_description: AI skill for premium UI/UX design â€” 107 styles, 127 palettes, 107 font pairings, 131 reasoning rules, 8 Python scripts, and 18 platform templates. Works with Claude, Cursor, Windsurf, Copilot, Antigravity, Cline & more.

files.README.md:
# UI UX Design Pro

A senior-level AI skill that provides data-driven design intelligence for building premium, production-grade UI/UX across multiple platforms and frameworks. Powered by **8 specialized Python scripts**, **16 tech stacks**, **18 platform templates**, and **1,875+ data rows** driving a BM25 search engine. ## Highlights - **107 UI Styles** â€” Glassmorphism, Liquid Glass, Data Brutalism, Spatial UI, Cyberpunk, AI-Native, and 100+ more - **127 Color Palettes** â€” Industry-specific palettes for SaaS, Fintech, Healthcare, E-commerce, Beauty, and more - **107 Font Pairings** â€” Curated typography combinations with Google Fonts imports and mood keywords - **106 Chart Types** â€” Data visualization recommendations with library suggestions - **131 Reasoning Rules** â€” Industry-specific design system generation with anti-patterns - **129 UX Guidelines** â€” Best practices covering accessibility, animation, forms, and more - **16 Tech Stacks** â€” React, Next.js, Vue, Nuxt.js, Angular, Remix, SolidJS, Svelte, Astro, and more - **8 Python Scripts** â€” BM25 search, contrast checker, palette/token/typography generators, UI auditor - **11 Reference Docs** â€” Intent-first design methodology - **18 Platform Templates** â€” Claude, Cursor, Windsurf, Copilot, Antigravity, Gemini, Cline, Amp, and more ## Prerequisites | Requirement | Version | Purpose | | ----------- | ------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **Python** | 3.x+ | Required for all 8 design scripts (search, contrast, palette, tokens, typography, system, audit, CLI) | | **Node.js** | 18+ | Required for `npx` quick install |
Install Python ```bash # macOS brew install python3 # Ubuntu/Debian sudo apt update && sudo apt install python3 # Windows winget install Python.Python.3.12 ```
Install Node.js ```bash # macOS brew install node # Ubuntu/Debian curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_22.x | sudo -E bash - sudo apt install -y nodejs # Windows winget install OpenJS.NodeJS.LTS ```
## Installation ### Quick Install (Recommended) ```bash npx skills add https://github.com/saifyxpro/ui-ux-design-pro-skill --skill ui-ux-design-pro ``` ### Manual Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/saifyxpro/ui-ux-design-pro-skill.git # Copy skill to your AI assistant's skill directory # For Claude Code mkdir -p .claude/skills/ cp -r src/ui-ux-design-pro .claude/skills/ # For Cursor mkdir -p .cursor/skills/ cp -r src/ui-ux-design-pro .cursor/skills/ # For Windsurf mkdir -p .windsurf/skills/ cp -r src/ui-ux-design-pro .windsurf/skills/ # For Antigravity cp -r src/ui-ux-design-pro ~/.gemini/antigravity/skills/ # For Cline mkdir -p .cline/skills/ cp -r src/ui-ux-design-pro .cline/skills/ # For Gemini CLI mkdir -p .gemini/skills/ cp -r src/ui-ux-design-pro .gemini/skills/ ``` ## Before & After See the difference the skill makes â€” same prompt, with and without UI/UX Design Pro: ### Landing Page (Example 01) | Without Skill | With Skill | | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------: | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------: | | | | | Generic layout, basic colors, default spacing | Premium typography, refined palette, professional hierarchy | ### SaaS Landing Page (Example 02) â€” One-Shotted with Skill Generated in a single prompt using the skill's design system CLI + "Warmth & Approachability" direction:

> **Prompt:** _"Generate a Warm Creative SaaS landing page using the design CLI"_ > > **Design Direction:** Warmth & Approachability Â· **Primary:** `#FF6B35` (Coral) Â· **Fonts:** Fraunces + Plus Jakarta Sans Â· **Radius:** 24-32px ## Examples | # | Type | Status | Description | | --- | ------------ | -------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | | 01 | Landing Page | âœ… Ready | Digital product agency with hero, services, testimonials, CTA | | 02 | SaaS Landing | âœ… Ready | Warm Creative AI platform â€” one-shotted with design CLI + skill | | 03 | E-commerce | ğŸ”œ Coming Soon | Product showcase with filters, cart, and checkout | | 04 | SaaS Landing | ğŸ”œ Coming Soon | Feature-rich SaaS marketing page with pricing tiers | | 05 | Portfolio | ğŸ”œ Coming Soon | Creative portfolio with bento grid layout | | 06 | Admin Panel | ğŸ”œ Coming Soon | Data-dense admin interface with charts and tables | > More examples are being added regularly. Each example includes before/after screenshots demonstrating the skill's impact. ## Features ### Intelligent Design System Generation The flagship feature is the **Design System Generator** â€” an AI-powered reasoning engine that analyzes your project requirements and generates a complete, tailored design system. ``` +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | TARGET: Fintech Dashboard - RECOMMENDED DESIGN SYSTEM | +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | | | STYLE: Data Brutalism | | Keywords: data, brutalism, terminal, monospace, grid, raw, functional | | Performance: High | Accessibility: High | | | | COLORS: | | Primary: #1E40AF (Royal Blue) | | Font: Fira Code (Monospace) | | | | GENERATED: | | Tokens: 83 CSS custom properties | | Palette: 5 colors (triadic harmony) | | Type Scale: 8 steps (major-third ratio) | | Reasoning: 2 industry rules applied | | UX Guidelines: 3 relevant guidelines | | | +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ ``` ### How It Works ``` â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚ 1. USER REQUEST â”‚ â”‚ "Build a fintech analytics dashboard" â”‚ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â”‚ â–¼ â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚ 2. MULTI-DOMAIN SEARCH (11 parallel BM25 searches) â”‚ â”‚ â€¢ Product type matching (96 categories) â”‚ â”‚ â€¢ Style recommendations (107 styles) â”‚ â”‚ â€¢ Color palette selection (127 palettes) â”‚ â”‚ â€¢ Typography pairing (107 font combinations) â”‚ â”‚ â€¢ Industry reasoning (131 rules) â”‚ â”‚ â€¢ UX guidelines (129 guidelines) â”‚ â”‚ â€¢ Chart recommendations (106 chart types) â”‚ â”‚ â€¢ Tech stack guidelines (16 frameworks) â”‚ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â”‚ â–¼ â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚ 3. DESIGN SYSTEM OUTPUT â”‚ â”‚ 83 CSS tokens + Color palette + Type scale â”‚ â”‚ + Industry reasoning + UX guidelines + Anti-patterns â”‚ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ ``` ### 8 Python Scripts | Command | Script | Purpose | | ------------ | ------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- | | `search` | `search_design.py` | BM25 search across all 11 design databases | | `contrast` | `check_contrast.py` | WCAG 2.2 / APCA contrast checker | | `palette` | `generate_palette.py` | Color harmony palette generator (6 modes) | | `tokens` | `generate_tokens.py` | CSS custom property generator with 8 presets | | `typography` | `generate_typography.py` | Modular type scale calculator (8 ratios) | | `system` | `generate_system.py` | Full design system generator with persistence | | `audit` | `audit_ui.py` | UI code quality and accessibility auditor (12 rules) | | `cli` | `design_cli.py` | Unified CLI entry point | ### 107 UI Styles
View All Styles | # | Style | Best For | | --- | ------------------------ | ------------------------------------------ | | 1 | Minimalism & Swiss Style | Enterprise apps, dashboards, documentation | | 2 | Neumorphism | Health/wellness apps, meditation platforms | | 3 | Glassmorphism | Modern SaaS, financial dashboards | | 4 | Brutalism | Design portfolios, artistic projects | | 5 | 3D & Hyperrealism | Gaming, product showcase, immersive | | 6 | Vibrant & Block-based | Startups, creative agencies, gaming | | 7 | Dark Mode (OLED) | Night-mode apps, coding platforms | | 8 | Accessible & Ethical | Government, healthcare, education | | 9 | Claymorphism | Educational apps, children's apps, SaaS | | 10 | Aurora UI | Modern SaaS, creative agencies | | ... | _+ 97 more styles_ | See `data/styles.csv` for full list | Includes: Liquid Glass, Aurora Borealis, Data Brutalism, Cyberpunk UI, Organic Biophilic, AI-Native UI, Spatial UI (VisionOS), Chromatic Aberration, Interactive Cursor Design, Voice-First Multimodal, and 30+ more.
### 131 Industry-Specific Reasoning Rules | Category | Examples | | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **Tech & SaaS** | SaaS, Micro SaaS, B2B Enterprise, Developer Tools, AI/Chatbot Platform | | **Finance** | Fintech, Banking, Crypto, Insurance, Trading Dashboard | | **Healthcare** | Medical Clinic, Pharmacy, Dental, Veterinary, Mental Health | | **E-commerce** | General, Luxury, Marketplace, Subscription Box | | **Services** | Beauty/Spa, Restaurant, Hotel, Legal, Consulting | | **Creative** | Portfolio, Agency, Photography, Gaming, Music Streaming | | **Emerging Tech** | Web3/NFT, Spatial Computing, Quantum Computing, Autonomous Systems | | **Telecommunications** | Cryptocurrency/Web3, Insurance, AI/ML Products, Telecom | ### 16 Supported Tech Stacks | Category | Stacks | | ------------------- | -------------------------------------- | | **Web (HTML)** | HTML + Tailwind (default) | | **React Ecosystem** | React, Next.js, shadcn/ui | | **Vue Ecosystem** | Vue, Nuxt.js, Nuxt UI | | **Other Web** | Svelte, Astro, Angular, Remix, SolidJS | | **iOS** | SwiftUI | | **Android** | Jetpack Compose | | **Cross-Platform** | React Native, Flutter | ### 18 Platform Templates | Platform | Root Folder | Type | | ----------------- | ------------ | -------- | | Claude Code | `.claude` | Skill | | Cursor | `.cursor` | Skill | | Windsurf | `.windsurf` | Skill | | Antigravity | `.agent` | Skill | | GitHub Copilot | `.github` | Workflow | | Gemini CLI | `.gemini` | Skill | | Codex CLI | `.codex` | Skill | | Kiro | `.kiro` | Workflow | | Roo Code | `.roo` | Workflow | | Continue | `.continue` | Skill | | Trae | `.trae` | Skill | | OpenCode | `.opencode` | Skill | | Qoder | `.qoder` | Skill | | CodeBuddy | `.codebuddy` | Skill | | Droid (Factory) | `.factory` | Skill | | Aider | `.aider` | Skill | | Cline | `.cline` | Skill | | Amp (Sourcegraph) | `.amp` | Skill | ### 27 CSV Databases (1,875+ rows) | File | Rows | Content | | ----------------------- | ---- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | | `styles.csv` | 107 | UI design styles with CSS keywords & accessibility ratings | | `typography.csv` | 107 | Google Font pairings with mood keywords & CSS imports | | `charts.csv` | 106 | Data visualization types with library recommendations | | `ui-reasoning.csv` | 131 | Industry-specific UI reasoning rules with anti-patterns | | `ux-guidelines.csv` | 129 | UX guidelines with do/don't examples | | `colors.csv` | 127 | Color palettes by industry with hex values | | `products.csv` | 96 | Product-type design recommendations | | `icons.csv` | 101 | Icon style guidelines | | `landing.csv` | 31 | Landing page patterns | | `react-performance.csv` | 45 | React performance guidelines | | `web-interface.csv` | 31 | Web interface patterns | | `stacks/*.csv` | 864 | 16 framework-specific guideline files | ### 11 Reference Documents Intent-first design methodology covering: - Token architecture with oklch - Color system engineering - Typography hierarchies with fluid scaling - Spacing grids and layout composition - Depth and elevation strategies - Component patterns for every UI element - Animation with specific timing - WCAG 2.2 accessibility - Cognitive science principles (Hick's, Fitts's, Gestalt) - Critique protocol and self-evaluation - Design direction examples ## Usage ### Skill Mode (Auto-activate) **Supported:** Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, Antigravity, Codex CLI, Continue, Gemini CLI, OpenCode, Qoder, CodeBuddy, Droid, Cline, Amp, Trae The skill activates automatically when you request UI/UX work. Just chat naturally: ``` Build a landing page for my SaaS product Create a dashboard for healthcare analytics Design a portfolio website with dark mode Build a fintech banking app with dark theme ``` > **Trae**: Switch to **SOLO** mode first. The skill will activate for UI/UX requests. ### Workflow Mode (Slash Command) **Supported:** Kiro, GitHub Copilot, Roo Code ``` /ui-ux-design-pro Build a landing page for my SaaS product ``` ### CLI Commands All scripts are accessible via the unified CLI: ```bash # Search across all design databases python3 scripts/design_cli.py search "SaaS dashboard" --domain style # Check color contrast (WCAG/APCA) python3 scripts/design_cli.py contrast "#1E293B" "#F8FAFC" --level AAA # Generate color palette python3 scripts/design_cli.py palette "#2563EB" --harmony triadic --count 5 # Generate CSS design tokens python3 scripts/design_cli.py tokens --preset fintech --format css # Calculate type scale python3 scripts/design_cli.py typography --scale golden --format css # Generate full design system python3 scripts/design_cli.py system "fintech dashboard" --stack nextjs --output design.json # Audit UI code quality python3 scripts/design_cli.py audit ./src/App.tsx ``` ### Token Presets `generate_tokens.py` ships with 8 industry presets: | Preset | Primary | Font | Radius | | ------------ | ------- | ---------------- | ------ | | `fintech` | #2563EB | Inter | 8px | | `healthcare` | #059669 | Source Sans Pro | 12px | | `ecommerce` | #DC2626 | Poppins | 8px | | `saas` | #7C3AED | Inter | 12px | | `education` | #2563EB | Nunito | 16px | | `gaming` | #EF4444 | Orbitron | 4px | | `luxury` | #1E293B | Playfair Display | 0px | | `startup` | #8B5CF6 | DM Sans | 12px | ### Color Harmony Modes `generate_palette.py` supports 6 harmony types: - **Complementary** â€” Opposite on color wheel (+180Â°) - **Analogous** â€” Adjacent colors (Â±30Â°) - **Triadic** â€” Three evenly spaced (+120Â°, +240Â°) - **Tetradic** â€” Four evenly spaced (+90Â°, +180Â°, +270Â°) - **Split-Complementary** â€” Modified complementary (+150Â°, +210Â°) - **Monochromatic** â€” Same hue, varying lightness ### Type Scale Ratios `generate_typography.py` supports 8 named ratios: | Ratio | Value | Feel | | ---------------- | ----- | ------------------ | | Minor Second | 1.067 | Subtle, tight | | Major Second | 1.125 | Balanced | | Minor Third | 1.200 | Clean | | Major Third | 1.250 | Standard (default) | | Perfect Fourth | 1.333 | Bold | | Augmented Fourth | 1.414 | Dramatic | | Perfect Fifth | 1.500 | Very bold | | Golden | 1.618 | Maximum contrast | ## Architecture ``` ui-ux-design-pro-skill/ â”œâ”€â”€ src/ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ ui-ux-design-pro/ # Source of truth â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ SKILL.md # Main skill document â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ data/ # 27 CSV databases (1,875+ rows) â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ styles.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ typography.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ charts.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ ui-reasoning.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ ux-guidelines.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ colors.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ products.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ icons.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ landing.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ react-performance.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ web-interface.csv â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ stacks/ # 16 framework guides â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ angular.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ nextjs.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ react.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ remix.csv â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ solidjs.csv â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ ... (11 more) â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ references/ # 11 design methodology docs â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ token-architecture.md â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ color-system.md â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ typography.md â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ spacing-and-layout.md â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ depth-and-elevation.md â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ component-patterns.md â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ animation-and-motion.md â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ accessibility.md â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ cognitive-principles.md â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ critique-protocol.md â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ design-directions.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ scripts/ # 8 Python scripts â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ design_cli.py â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ search_design.py â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ generate_system.py â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ generate_tokens.py â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ generate_palette.py â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ generate_typography.py â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ check_contrast.py â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ audit_ui.py â”‚ â””â”€â”€ templates/ # 18 platform templates â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ base/ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ quick-reference.md â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ skill-content.md â”‚ â””â”€â”€ platforms/ # 18 AI assistant configs â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ claude.json â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ cursor.json â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ windsurf.json â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ antigravity.json â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ copilot.json â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ gemini.json â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ cline.json â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ amp.json â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ aider.json â”‚ â””â”€â”€ ... (9 more) â”œâ”€â”€ .gitignore â”œâ”€â”€ LICENSE â””â”€â”€ README.md ``` ## License This project is licensed under the [MIT License](LICENSE).

plugins.name: ui-ux-design-pro
plugins.description: Professional UI/UX design intelligence for AI coding assistants. Data-driven architecture with BM25 search engine, WCAG/APCA contrast checker, color palette generator, CSS token generator, type scale calculator, design system generator, and UI auditor. Includes searchable databases of styles, colors, typography, charts, reasoning rules, and UX guidelines for React, Next.js, Astro, Vue, Nuxt.js, Nuxt UI, Svelte, Angular, Remix, SolidJS, SwiftUI, React Native, Flutter, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, and Jetpack Compose.
